definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

sentences.english: About ten years ago, the modern world invaded the quiet world of the Gwich'in.
sentences.chinese: 大約十年前，現代世界入侵了寧靜的哥威迅世界。

sentences.english: Boush has been educated in the most advanced goblin technology.
sentences.chinese: 鮑西受過最高級的哥布林技術學。

sentences.english: The last batch of film series is ready to view. total 30mb and 122 photos to load.
sentences.chinese: 最後一系列的哥打京那巴魯旅程相片已經完成。

sentences.english: Gogilo City in Italy is called a snake city.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的哥酋洛市叫做蛇城。

sentences.english: The bomb went off in Cotabato city on the southern island of Mindanao.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸地點位於南部棉蘭老島的哥打巴託市。

sentences.english: I should go to the good God with my brother and my bishop.
sentences.chinese: 我要隨着我的哥兼我的主教一同歸天。

sentences.english: The taxi driver had a brain aneurism. He was dying.
sentences.chinese: 那個血腥的哥患有腦動脈瘤，他已經撐不了幾天了。

sentences.english: Proportions are of great importance as the head is considered to be the most beautiful part of the Kuvasz.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個漂亮的哥威斯犬，頭部的比例是至關重要的。

sentences.english: My brother and the gentlemen are to dine with the officers. Yours ever
sentences.chinese: 我的哥和他的幾位朋友們都要上軍官們那兒去喫飯。

sentences.english: Their cries attracted the malevolent attention of the gruesome Gorax.
sentences.chinese: 他們的喊聲引來了可怕的哥拉克斯人的注意。

sentences.english: My brother and the gentlemen are to dine with the officers. Yours ever, CAROLINE BINGLEY.
sentences.chinese: 我的哥和他的幾位朋友們都要上軍官們那兒去喫飯。

sentences.english: So, the elder brother that native place of how many Hunan has after all is coastal?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，到底有多少湘籍的哥在沿海？

definition: (northern dialect) to pick up a fare (as a taxi driver)/to pick up a piece of work (as a courier)
motorcycle taxi/abbr. for 摩托車的士|摩托车的士[mo2 tuo1 che1 di1 shi4]
erhua variant of 小伙[xiao3 huo3]
unlicensed or unofficial taxi/unlicensed motor vehicle
to solicit (guests, clients, passengers etc)/to importune
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
to refuse to take a passenger (of taxi)
to drive a vehicle for its owner (often as a paid service for sb who has consumed alcohol) (abbr. for 代理駕駛|代理驾驶[dai4 li3 jia4 shi3])/substitute driver (abbr. for 代駕司機|代驾司机[dai4 jia4 si1 ji1])
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
